text: Can you book a hotel room for me?
Sure, I can help you with that. Can you tell me the name of the hotel you want to book?
Great! And when do you want to check in?
And when do you plan to check out?
How many rooms do you need?
And how many adults and children will be staying?
I have successfully booked your hotel rooms at Hilton. Your order ID is ABC123. Is there anything else that I can help with?
